summary: She was beautiful, smart, and searching. He was an emerging genius in the world of photography. When they met, they fell instantly in love. Setting off across the West with camera and ... See full summary »
cast: Christine Bernsten|Eric DiIlio|Frank DiMarco|Jason T. Edwards|Rachel Fern Harris|Arthur Ollman|Ritah Parrish|Rondal Partridge|Barrett Rudich|Jonathan Spaulding|Jennifer Watts|Charis Wilson
title: Eloquent Nude: The Love and Legacy of Edward Weston & Charis Wilson
